title: GazetaBitcoin
author: GazetaBitcoin
content: This topic is mostly addressed to global administrators and to gmaxwell, achow101, as they are mods of Wallet software board. The topic should be addressed, in fact, to Andreas Schildbach, the mod of Bitcoin Wallet for Android board but, since he was last active in 2018, I doubt that he is acting as a mod anymore.During some recent research, I observed that most of the topics posted in Bitcoin Wallet for Android board are not referring to this wallet.Based on some posts made by Andreas Schildbach or by Mike Hearn and also based by common sense (n.b. the name of the board should tell clearly its purpose), it was clear to me that topics from the respective board are supposed to be dedicated to the wallet named "Bitcoin Wallet for Android" and not to any wallet running on Android platform. Having that in mind, I noticed that most of the topics present in the respective board do not belong there.Therefore I would like to point this out to the above mentioned moderators, in case they think they should move to Wallet software board all the topics from Bitcoin Wallet for Android board which do not related to Bitcoin Wallet for Android app.Alternatively, I could also report those topics for not belonging to the respective board but I don't know if this would be the best approach. For instance, some topics are older than 6 months so reports made for those would be mostly flagged as Bad by default. This is the reason for which I thought to write this topic.

comments.author: _act_
comments.created_time: September 06, 2023, 05:03:08 PMLast edit: September 06, 2023, 05:20:01 PM by _act_
comments.body: If topics should be moved from that board, the board too should ceased. How many people are still using Bitcoin Wallet for Android on this forum? I think their number would be low and it does not need to have a board anymore. Likewise Mycelium.I will prefer the board to be for all Android wallets or it should be ceased.

comments.author: joker_josue
comments.body: If this board was intended only for this specific application, then logically all topics that don't talk about it should be moved.Additionally, a fixed topic must be added to make it clear what the objective of this board is. Now, this board could also be changed to cover all Android wallets. Does this make any sense?

comments.author: GazetaBitcoin
comments.body: Quote from: _act_ on September 06, 2023, 05:03:08 PMIf topics should be moved from that board, the board too should ceased.I said that only topics not related to Bitcoin Wallet for Android should be moved from that board... The ones related to this wallet should be kept.Quote from: _act_ on September 06, 2023, 05:03:08 PMHow many people are still using Bitcoin Wallet for Android on this forum?I think their number would be low and it does not need to have a board anymore. Likewise Mycelium.I don't know how many are still using that wallet, but I am one of them  And the wallet is still listed as a recommended wallet on bitcoin.org, together with Mycelium.Quote from: joker_josue on September 06, 2023, 07:22:40 PMIf this board was intended only for this specific application, then logically all topics that don't talk about it should be moved.This is also what I think.Quote from: joker_josue on September 06, 2023, 07:22:40 PMAdditionally, a fixed topic must be added to make it clear what the objective of this board is.A statement on this matter was made inside the first topic of the board, by Bitcoin Wallet developer (which was also a mod back then):Quote from: Andreas Schildbach on January 28, 2013, 05:37:49 PMWelcome to the Bitcoin Wallet subforum!I think it's appropriate now to open new threads for new discussions, questions or issues. I will try to monitor this forum at least daily and answer questions if I can. So just ask ahead!Quote from: _act_ on September 06, 2023, 05:03:08 PMI will prefer the board to be for all Android wallets or it should be ceased.Quote from: joker_josue on September 06, 2023, 07:22:40 PMNow, this board could also be changed to cover all Android wallets. Does this make any sense?Well, I can not change the forum design... I just mentioned an existing issue. The fix can be done by keeping only the wallets related to Bitcoin Wallet inside its allocated board, instead of changing the forum design (by removing the board completely or by making it a board for all Android wallets). Furthermore, if the board would be redesigned as a board for all Android wallets this would mean even more work for mods, as they should move all topics from Wallet software board which are related to Android wallets inside Bitcoin Wallet board... Does this make sense?

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: For a long time I've been wondering why there is a child board dedicated to Android OS and there is no IOS/Linux sub-boards. this is first time I know it dedicated to "Bitcoin wallet" by Andreas Schildbach. I have a topic there since 2020/2021, so I think we are talking about most of the topics in that board, and it may be archival due to inactivity.Rename board name is the best solution or create an archived board for "Bitcoin wallet" by schildbach and keep other topics after rename it.so only admins can do this

comments.author: joker_josue

I just mentioned an existing issue. The fix can be done by keeping only the wallets related to Bitcoin Wallet inside its allocated board, instead of changing the forum design (by removing the board completely or by making it a board for all Android wallets). Furthermore, if the board would be redesigned as a board for all Android wallets this would mean even more work for mods, as they should move all topics from Wallet software board which are related to Android wallets inside Bitcoin Wallet board... In turn, topics that are not linked to this specific portfolio must be moved to the appropriate board.

comments.author: Findingnemo
comments.body: Quote from: GazetaBitcoin on September 06, 2023, 04:45:44 PM, in case they think they should move to Wallet software board all the topics from Bitcoin Wallet for Android board which do not related to Bitcoin Wallet for Android app.Honestly, I didn't know that the child board belongs to one wallet named Bitcoin Wallet for all my years being on bitcointalk. There should be a sticky in that child board to avoid this confusion in the future. I wonder how many members are going to be stunned after seeing this thread.

comments.author: GazetaBitcoin
comments.body: Quote from: Findingnemo on September 07, 2023, 01:05:28 PMHonestly, I didn't know that the child board belongs to one wallet named Bitcoin Wallet for all my years being on bitcointalk. Well, as you see, you are not the only one not aware about the purpose of this board Quote from: Findingnemo on September 07, 2023, 01:05:28 PMThere should be a sticky in that child board to avoid this confusion in the future.I agree here. Even the post made the app developer is not 100% clear. The only clear message about the purpose of this board is this one, made by Mike Hearn (highlight is mine):Quote from: Mike Hearn on January 10, 2014, 03:10:51 PMThis forum is for an app called "Bitcoin Wallet" by Andreas Schildbach, this one:https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=de.schildbach.walletIt's not for all wallets that run on Android, despite the perhaps confusing naming.Additionally, I found one more post, made by the app developer, which explains the same thing:Quote from: Andreas Schildbach on January 08, 2015, 09:48:56 AMThis forum is about the Android appÂ  Bitcoin Wallet. Look here for other wallets.
